Detailed Description

Polygon node used to define tube boundaries at the given point.

)
virtual

Set this object to be linear interpolated between first and second parameter.

Parameters
firstfirst node parameter.
secondsecond node parameter.
alphawhen 0 result equals first parameter, when 1 equals second. For other values is linear interpolated between this two edge parameters.
